license.name: Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International

items.name: Disease-Prediction-System
items.description: This project implements a Disease Prediction System using various machine learning algorithms to predict potential diseases based on user-provided symptoms. The system utilizes a Django web framework to provide a user-friendly interface for inputting symptoms and viewing the predicted disease.

items.name: Machine-Learning-API
items.description: This project aims to develop a machine learning API using Fast API web framework for predicting patients with Sepsis.

items.name: NASA-EOSDIS-Ecosystem-Classification
items.description: This project pioneers a PySpark-based machine learning framework for ecosystem health classification using atmospheric and environmental data. By seamlessly integrating PySpark with advanced machine learning algorithms, it analyzes diverse ecological features sourced from NASA‚Äôs Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS)

items.name: Spam-vs-Ham-Classifier
items.description: This project is an implementation of a machine learning classifier designed to distinguish between spam (unsolicited or unwanted messages) and ham (legitimate messages) in text data. Built using Python and popular machine learning libraries like scikit-learn, it provides a robust framework for classifying text data into spam or ham categories.

items.name: AutoRDF2GML
items.description: AutoRDF2GML is a novel framework that semi-automatically transforms RDF data into heterogeneous graph datasets suitable for graph-based machine learning such as graph neural network (GNNs).

items.name: Deep-Dive-Into-AI-With-MLX-PyTorch
items.description: "Deep Dive into AI with MLX and PyTorch" is an educational initiative designed to help anyone interested in AI, specifically in machine learning and deep learning, using Apple's MLX and Meta's PyTorch frameworks.

items.name: SemiS-VFL
items.description: A Semi-supervised Machine Learning Framework for Vertical Federated Learning

items.name: Bug-Severity-Predictor
items.description: An advanced machine learning framework for predicting software bug severity, enhancing the efficacy of bug resolution processes in software development workflows. By leveraging sophisticated machine learning methodologies, this solution boosts software quality and user experience.

items.name: GalaktaGlare
items.description: A broad, easy and fast framework for machine/deep learning in Go.

items.name: Random_Learning
items.description: Exploring some machine learning frameworks.

items.name: PyTorch
items.description: This repository documents my journey with PyTorch, an open-source machine learning framework developed by Facebook. Here, I systematically organize my learning progress, share code snippets, notes, and projects related to PyTorch.
